comments.content: This is great but I am working on google sites and you have to type just a html code and you can't upload files or anything like that so if you could please help me with that would be very nice have a great day!
Good but will this run properly or it's just a showpiece....I Mean that do we need any further code for running it properly on website and how we will receive comments!

replies.content: If you're still new, I'd recommend focusing on the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JS before considering React. It's very tempting to jump ahead but lay a solid foundation first.
I couldn't agree more with this. Everything moves so fast and it always seems like everyone knows the newest library/framework. But the fundamentals are what stay constant.
